full_summary:
=================
### Government Tender Announcement: Custom Ear Protection
#### Solicitation Number: WS4279690676

**Solicitation Status**
The solicitation for custom ear protection is currently [Expired](#Expired|language=en). The original announcement appeared on **2024-01-29** and was last modified on **2024-02-21**.

**Solicitation Details**
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Variations or combinations of the above methods  
*   **Country of Operation:** Canada  
*   **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia  

**Contract Information**
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)  
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Québec, K1A 0S5  
*   **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)  
*   **End User Entity Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2  

**Bid Submission**
*   Bids will be accepted until **2024-02-27 14:00:00** using the Ariba Discovery platform located at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18631662?extsite=MTg2MzE2NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18631662?extsite=MTg2MzE2NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
*   Paper bids will not be accepted

**About the Solicitation**
The solicitation requires the delivery of up to 150 pairs of custom reusable decibel blocking ear protectors [_Specific_Unspsc-standard(46181900)_] for use by the Department of National Defence

Read more on [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18631662?extsite=MTg2MzE2NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18631662?extsite=MTg2MzE2NjJfQU4
